TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapServerProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.ServerProtocol

summary.span: .NET Framework 创建 类的一个实例来处理 XML Web services 请求。

span.span: The .NET Framework creates an instance of the class to process XML Web service requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写 方法，以处理用户不会通过标记为的 XML Web service 中的方法显式声明和处理 XML Web service 请求 `WebMethodAttribute` 。You can override the method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写 方法，以处理用户不会通过标记为的 XML Web service 中的方法显式声明和处理 XML Web service 请求 `WebMethodAttribute` 。You can override the method to process XML Web service requests that are not explicitly declared and handled by users through a method in their XML Web service marked with `WebMethodAttribute`.
